item_category: The Lenovo Tab M10 (HD) is one impressive family tablet. It is packed with powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon quad-core 2.0 GHz and supports fast connection with true 2.4 GHz/5 GHz WiFi dual bands. Inside lies an impressive HD screen and dual front speakers for immersive entertainment – impossibly contained within an extremely thin and light profile. Plus, make it truly family-friendly by adding Kid's Pack and Stylish Folio Case (sold seperately). This is one tablet you'll want to pass around the house.

Lenovo M10 tablet is light in weight, has a good 10inch HD screen with good graphics great for watching a movie or favourite series. Tablet has dual front-facing speakers which is very noticeable good sound quality. Set-up took less than 2 minutes which has face recognition, multiple user access, and great child friendly mode. Camera isn’t bad at 5mp and a 2mp front facing, Installed memory of 32GB is more than enough for saving my photos and videos.

The tablet is light and well presented, unfortunately that's all that's good about it. The colours on screen are very dull,even when you crank up the display options. I've given this to my son as he likes to use it for YouTube.  If you want a tablet that a good starting point then I would say stay away from this one.

Stylish design & lightweight, good handbag/manbag size for commuters! Battery lasts a good few days too!

The Lenovo tablet arrived in a very expensive looking package. It compared very well with the packaging of more expensive tablets. Outside in the garden really surprised me, the picture quality and clarity in the sunshine was excellent! 
I would definitely recommend this tablet to everyone!

Good quality HD screen and have no issues at watching a movie or playing games. Sound quality is also very good with Dolby Audio gives it a much better user experience.

Easy to load films as memory is expandable via micro card. Screen ok in most light except bright sunlight.  Overall looks good and works well great value for money

This is a great tablet if you are looking for a solid piece of kit for a lot less money than other well known brands.

You are able to put a SIM in the tablet too should you want to.
The operating speed is okay. And if you just want a tablet for  browsing the internet, going on facebook etc then this is great.

The Lenovo M10 Tab HD 32gb first impression is light and looks good. It was really easy and quick to set up through Google Drive sharing documents and photos  from my IOS account. Sound quality from YouTube is very good and clear. Volume was decent but it would of benefited from being a little louder. The usual social media apps (Instagram, Snap Chat, TikTok) worked great but this is expected. Roblox also worked good however a little laggy at times on this game. Good quality pictures.

Smooth running, loads quickly, responds fast. Slim and lightweight so easy to hold even with having a large screen. Graphics are beautiful and bright! Sound is amazing, clear and loud due to the dual front speakers. I love how you can add a child’s account with restrictions so there’s no worry about what they are going on, and add multiple other users so very family friendly being able to each have our own account. Can add a keyboard to aid homework. Small downside it shows every fingerprint
